name: detour (itch) (corrox)
description:
a short text-based game with multiple endings made for halloween

the game contains flashing imagery, player discretion is advised


you, a writer, got a job offer at a distant city where you are travelling right now.

 suddenly you hear a pop and you get a flat tire. 

you check your trunk but there is no spare tire left. 

suddenly you see an orangish light and decide to walk towards it.
